Description: Pottery ostracon, with one incised line of Coptic (?) on exterior, from the rim of a vessel.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394049) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394049)
